definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: When the fire engines arrived the ladders reached only to the sixth floor.
sentences.chinese: 當消防車趕到，雲梯車只能達到到六樓。

sentences.english: A total of 14 fire engines and 66 firefighters were called to the site.
sentences.chinese: 所有的14臺消防車和66名消防隊員都趕至現場。

sentences.english: Lift-up fire engine is an important fire fighting equipment which can eradicate fire from high-rise buildings.
sentences.chinese: 登高消防車是撲滅高層建築火災的重要消防設備。

sentences.english: What do you usually do?I drive a fire-engine.
sentences.chinese: 你通常做什麼？我駕駛一輛消防車。

sentences.english: The pick-up and set-down area was soon crowded with ambulances and fire engines.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的上落區很快就擠滿了救護車和消防車。

sentences.english: My daughter's first bedroom had a fire-engine red accent wall.
sentences.chinese: 我女兒最初臥室牆壁顏色是消防車般的紅色。

sentences.english: The two died after their fire engine crashed down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 兩人的消防車掉下山後喪生。

sentences.english: Then came an earthmover to level off the ground for a fire engine.
sentences.chinese: 接著，推土機前來爲消防車開路。

sentences.english: Now that somebody wanted to commit suicide, why drove so many fire trucks there?
sentences.chinese: 既然是有人想要自殺，那開那麼多消防車去幹什麼？

sentences.english: Ask the more able students to draw a fire-engine on the board.
sentences.chinese: 讓基礎好一些的學生上黑板上畫消防車。

sentences.english: Then I heard it - the sound of a fire engine.
sentences.chinese: 然後，我聽見了消防車的聲音。

sentences.english: Some anti-riot trucks were repainted red and were used as fire engines. Here is the Magirus-Mercur model from 1962
sentences.chinese: 有些防暴卡車被重新噴塗成爲紅色並被用作消防車。

sentences.english: The cars all stopped to let the fire-engine by.
sentences.chinese: 車輛都停下來，讓消防車通過。

sentences.english: They switched to military fire engines to dowse the reactors and the pools of spent fuel rods beside them.
sentences.chinese: 他們轉向了軍事消防車來冷卻反應堆和燃料池。

definition: to start out on a trip/to dispatch troops
to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
aerial work platform (e.g. cherry picker or scissor lift)/lift/elevator
firefighting/to extinguish a fire and save life and property/to dive (of goalkeeper in soccer)
